features: EASY TO ATTACH – The most popular toys that parents choose for their kids are easy to use. Benbat’s car activity center is easy to attach and remove from the seat—making this one of the top toys to choose from. These popular toys are fun, educational, and easy to use.

DOUBLE SIDED – The best educational toys for your child are designed with lots of interactivity. The Benbat car toy activity center has a double sided artboard for hours of attention and learning. Both sides are colorful, engaging, and most of all... fun!

0-18 MONTHS – This baby toy is great for infants as early as 0 months. These sensory toys help stimulate early learning. Using learning toys from an early age helps to engage active learning in your young child. Make sure to include baby learning toys in your travel plans!

INTERACTIVE DESIGN – These tactile sensory toys are designed to be interactive. This grasping toy encourages exploration which helps increase intelligence and environmental awareness. Use kinesthetic toys like this to keep your child active, engaged, and learning!

ADJUSTABLE ARCH – The best toddler toys can adapt to your child's needs. These adjustable car seat toys give you freedom to raise or lower the arch for best use. It’s one of the coolest toys for travel use—keep your child engaged for hours!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Play & Kick Car Activity Center Two stage activity center with plush toys for rear-seated babies. High contract black & white illustrations for early stages and vibrant colorful side with loads of entertainment and fun to keep baby happy in the car. Includes squeaking noises by batting the squirrel’s belly, Dazzle effect Star and a peek-a-boo mirror with acorn teether. The arch and toys position can be adjusted according to baby’s growth, development and preferences.

Important to know Double-Sided Story Board Stage 1 - Black & White illustrations for early development. It is recommended to lift arch & toys up for this stage. Stage 2 - vibrant colorful side with loads of entertainment and fun to keep baby happy in the car. Quick & Easy In\Out of Car Arch can be folded up for quick and easy removal of baby from car seat Adjustable Arch Arch height can be adjustable according to baby's growth and preferences

Simple Installation Easy to attach & adjust straps for quick installation to seat’s headrest. This product is suitable for cars with adjustable headrest only. Your Baby's Fun on the Road This product is especially designed for rear facing babies while traveling by car. Dazzle Effect star, Plush crinkly tail & rattling squirrel, peek-a-boo mirror and acorn teether develops baby’s senses and will keep baby happy and entertained throughout the drive. Perfect Gift The perfect baby shower gift for expecting parents to ensure baby will have the best car experience with loads of fun and developmental stimulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used in car as well as hanging over the crib while supervised. Our 2 month old granddaughter stares at it for minutes on end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Improved car rides - the squirrel is the best!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome! My son hated car rides from birth until about 3.5 months old. It’s still a bit iffy, but it’s getting better. This is not an end all, be all but it has helped drastically! I had a mirror thing when I first bought to see him, and both worked fine together. I’ve since then upgraded to a camera to see him better and they still work well together! No safety or installation concerns either.The squirrel is his absolute favorite toy. It’s not your average squeaker.. it’s more like a chirping? I don’t know, but he LOVES it!Anyway, love this product, worth the price for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for non-screen entertainment!
reviews.reviewText: Fits great with our rear facing car seat and mirror on the headrest. The toys on then and can be shifted, and we could even add other toys if we want. Love that the band can be adjusted to be out of the way to take the car seat in and out. Glad to have this for long and short car rides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but not for fixed headrest vehicles
reviews.reviewText: My little one absolutely loves this and it has made car rides much more pleasant for us all! She is rear facing and the toy bar is perfect for her to reach it and play. BUT I had to alter it to make it work, as the strap to secure it is incompatible with a fixed headrest. It's far too short to go around a fixed headrest, so I tied it around with string and then saftey pinned it to the seat back fabric to be sure it would stay. I'm ok with this alteration as she loves it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: quality is good and my baby loves it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute thing to have in the car. I got it bc, unlike the other choices, this could be used with a mirror. It doesn’t boast that ability specifically in the listing but based on pics of this item and reviews/pics of other items that clearly DONT accommodate the mirror, I presumed it would work.Things realized once it’s actually Been in use:1) it working with a mirror is..... iffy. The mirror Does in fact stay up and this item fits nicely with the mirror on. Great. Except the center support strap for the toy prevents the mirror from resting nicely and causes it to slide to the side and becomes unusable. It is quite possibly my mirror that is just not stable enough and a new mirror will need to be Purchased. I will have to mess around w it and see what can be jimmied up to secure it better. But in case you were like me and got this bc of the mirror thing, just know that it might not be perfect. It’s like it works 95% w the mirror I have, but the 5% not working is a big 5% lol2) the round bar that comes out With the toys attached is basically like a giant foam handle bar for my sons hands and feet. He rips at it and kicks it and not only does that exacerbate the mirror problem mentioned above, but it tangles him up in the whole thing, the toys slide down to the sides and there goes the whole purpose of having it. For almost $40 I wanted these two issues to not exist at all, never mind together, within 5 min of using it, and every time thereafter lol. It’s up and it’s there and he plays with it for sure but it’s definitely become this added thing For me to adjust and readjust with every car ride.Update: the mirror has been secured a bit better and my son has calmed down w the kicking bc it’s not new to him anymore. At this point I don’t even think about it anymore he just goes in the car and played with it nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed car rides instantly!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was 3 months when I got this. She would cry every car ride and it was heart breaking. Once I put this in and she figured out it moved, she was fine. Then a few weeks later, she realized she could kick and reach it and it was amazing! She can't get any of the toys to her mouth, which I love, but she pulls them, hits them, kicks them, and makes them make their noises. She has not screamed in the car for no reason since I put this in the car. Worth every penny (even though I don't see why it's so expensive).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Won't over stimulate baby
reviews.reviewText: We had a 6 hr ride last week and this helped in between stops/feedings, and naps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Read my baby hates car travel n has just begun getting distracted by this toy. I love yhe fox when you shake it it squeaks which makes my daughter laugh
